channel.title: Yeah, I'm changing my name - Polar -> polarzero
channel.description:
Hey guys, so it's been on my mind for a while that Polar is just a very generic name and plenty of other producers go by it. But, I still want to be known as Polar, so I came up with the solution to add a unique touch to the word. It isn't taken by anyone else on Soundcloud, nor on Spotify. So now that you know the reasoning, I'm changing my name to polarzero. And my new logo is my pfp.
The reason behind posting this is just to make sure everyone is up to date, and so that everyone knows who the hell that polarzero guy their following is.
